This model doesn’t receive as frequent discounts as its Goat O1000 and A2500 models, though we have seen it dropping between $2,600 and $2,500 most of the year, with more recent falls as low as $2,100 and a one-time Prime Day low of $2,085. You’re looking at the second-best price here while the savings stick around, giving you the most advanced robot mower from the brand’s lineup with $900 savings. You can also save more by going with the base Goat O1000 robot that is down at new $699 low right now for Christmas – with both models arriving before the upcoming holiday.

items.title: Jackery Xmas flash sale up to $1,700 off power stations: First deal on Explorer 300D 40W solar bundle at $249, more
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Christmas Holiday Sale, Jackery has launched a 72-hour flash sale with up to $1,700 savings across four particular units, dropping most of them to new and returning low prices, while also offering the first-ever deal on the latest Explorer 300D Portable Power Station with a 40W Air solar panel for $249 shipped. You can also find the standalone station for $169 shipped. The station recently snuck onto the scene with little media attention and normally goes for $219 at full price, while the flash-featured bundle goes for $359. This is the very first savings that we have noticed on this compact unit, which is nowhere to be found on Amazon. All-in-all, you’re getting a $50 markdown on the station and $110 off the bundle, which sets the bar for future discounts down the road. Head below to check out all the other 72-hour low prices while they’re still around!

items.title: Keep food warm at work or during other outings in Crock-Pot’s 20-ounce electric lunch boxes for $30, more from $36
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the Crock-Pot 20-Ounce Electric Lunch Box at $29.99 shipped in all four colorways, which would make a great gift for your hard-working loved ones that prefer warm meals on the job or even for outings and the like – plus, it arrives well before Christmas for the time being. It normally runs for $40 at full price, which we’ve almost entirely seen taken down to this rate over the year, beaten out by a few deals that went a few dollars lower. It’s back for Christmas shopping needs, with $10 savings that lands it within a couple of dollars of its lowest rate. We’ve also collected a number of the brand’s other cooking devices/appliances below.

items.title: Apple’s M5 MacBook Pro is over $300 off at Best Buy right now (Open-box w/ 1-yr. warranty)
items.summary:
This morning we caught Amazon bringing the base 16GB/512GB M5 MacBook Pro in stock at $250 off, but if you’re trying to keep as many of those pennies in your pocket as possible, you’ll find this same machine over at Best Buy right now in “excellent” condition open-box at over $300 off.

items.title: Insta360’s Flow 2 Pro gimbal with Apple DockKit subject-tracking is a great iPhone filmmaking gift, now down to $127 low
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find Insta360’s official storefront offering its Flow 2 Pro smartphone gimbal standard bundle for $126.99 shipped. This particular model hit the scene earlier this year carrying a $160 price tag. Today’s 21% discount shaves $33 off its usual going rate, marking the return of the lowest price we first tracked for this unit during the fall Prime Day sale. The white variant of this gimbal has also hit the $127 low today, and you’ll find its Creator bundle with some neat extras fetching $132.99 shipped instead of its usual $190 price. Head below for more details.

Meta says it has “paused” its third-party Horizon OS headset program, announced in April 2024 with Asus and Lenovo as its first partners to build the headsets  —  Meta has “paused” its initiative to bring third-party Horizon OS headsets to the market.

items.title: First savings just hit Navee’s newest feature-packed XT5 Pro long-range off-road electric scooter for $1,400
items.summary:
Navee’s official Amazon storefront is undercutting the brand’s direct Christmas Sale pricing on its brand-new XT5 Pro Long-Range Off-Road Electric Scooter for $1,399.99 shipped, after clipping the on-page $200 off coupon. This model just hit the market early last month with a $1,500 price tag, which is where it’s still priced direct from the brand. At Amazon, however, it started off priced at $1,700 and dropped to $1,600 right before Black Friday, with today’s deal being the first official chance at cash savings that we’ve spotted. While this deal lasts, you’re getting $100 off the going rate that sets the bar for future discounts, while also upgrading your commutes/joyrides with the brand’s take on a superscooter.

more…

On your way down, be sure to scope out the deals we are tracking on M4 MacBook Air – all configs are now $250 off at Amazon – as well as M5 MacBook Pro at $250 off and this giant $699 price drop on M4 iPad Pro configs at Costco.
